I changed my summoners to A and S, I believe its a very good setup when you get use to it, I think I have an easier time than most, if its bad it doesn't seem to ever affect me and I've almost never fail flashed on almost any of my accounts.
Its also closer to your QWE fingers and allows me to keep my pinky finger on shift, haven't played in a few months so I am a little rusty right now though.

I don't use either..I play with my abilities bound to 1234 and use q and e for summoners. I move my minimap with wasd.

Really? Feels kinda awkward. You have to let go of your "finger setting" to reach q or sprain your ring finger. That's the advantage ( to me ) of leaving summoners on D, F. You can reach both more easily with your index finger, without letting go of Q,W for spells.

Suggestion here: Combination of right mouse button and key would be nice. Since you can keep the right mouse button pressed to move and just hit e.g. Q at the same time to flash.
Man i have same settings ^^

Flash ults are so important, and have to be timed so precisely, that I like flash on D so I can press it with my middle finger and ult with my index finger.
Why would you use Summoner Spells with your "ability fingers"? Why would you take your finger off from abilities in the first place? What is your thumb doing? Nothing?
I naturally rest my thumb on the spacebar, yeah it doesn't do anything there but it feels better (read: fewer hand cramps). It's not optimal but it's who I am.
Flash is your most important spell so it must be prioritized at ...D, of course! D* D* D *poof!
Taylor Cocke, Investigative Journalist M.D.

My fat fingers have twice hit F while pinging.  I will never put Flash in F again.
agree with the other beta players, flash always go in "A" ALWAYS!{{summoner:4}}

meh... but why? I don't even... with what finger did you plan to press that A? Pinky?

 I would say that it's rather logical, that since we have 4 champ abilities in game, you dedicate 4 fingers to them, so 1 for each ability... so, what's left? Your thumb. Why wouldn't you dedicate your thumb to use Summoner Spells since they have a much longer CD than any other ability thus they are used less often? Then you wouldn't need reposition your 4 dedicated ability fingers in any way.

Ring finger is for 1, Q and A, Middle is for 2, W and S, Index for 4, E and R, Pinky for shift, ctrl and tab, Thumb for alt, space. I have item 3 bound to mouse 3, item 6 bound to mouse 4 and trinket bound to mouse 5. D is hold position. Item slot 5 is where I always put my boots. I also bind items slot 4 to keys 3 and 4 since I found that sometimes I fat finger 3 when I press 4.

You're going to have to reposition your fingers at some point if you also want to factor in items, hold position, ctrl for level up, alt for self cast, shift for smart cast toggle/attack move.
